title: Add authentication gate with Internet Identity and update landing page design

requirements.text: Implement an authentication gate using Internet Identity that requires users to log in before accessing any app routes beyond the login page. Support passkey, email, and phone number authentication methods.

quotes: Use pass keys email or phone number

acceptanceCriteria: Users are redirected to a login page when not authenticated
Internet Identity authentication supports passkey, email, and phone number methods
After successful login, users can access all app routes
Authentication state persists across page refreshes

requirements.text: Add transparent decorative background elements featuring weights/dumbbells and nature imagery (leaves, mountains, trees) positioned around the screen edges throughout the application.

quotes: add weights and nature around the screen make them transparent

acceptanceCriteria: Decorative weight/dumbbell images are visible with transparency around screen edges
Nature elements (leaves, mountains, trees) are visible with transparency around screen edges
Decorative elements do not interfere with interactive UI components
Elements are positioned consistently across all pages

requirements.text: Update the motivational quote on the landing page from 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow' to 'Exercise today and be proud of yourself tomorrow'.

quotes: add the quote excercise today and be proud or yourself tomorrow

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays the new quote 'Exercise today and be proud of yourself tomorrow'
Quote maintains prominent visual styling consistent with existing design

requirements.text: Remove the unwanted image from the main landing page that was not part of the original user request.

quotes: Could u also remove the picture of the main screen i dint ask for that

acceptanceCriteria: Unwanted image element is removed from the landing page
Page layout remains intact after image removal
No broken image links or placeholders remain

requirements.text: Generate decorative images for transparent weight/dumbbell illustrations and nature elements (leaves, mountains, trees) to be used as static assets for the background decoration feature.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved to frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images have transparent backgrounds suitable for overlay decoration
Weight and nature images are visually cohesive with the fitness app theme

constraints: Use the existing Internet Identity authentication system already integrated in the codebase
Do not modify the backend authentication logic
Preserve existing routing structure and component architecture
Maintain responsive design across all screen sizes
nonGoals: Implementing custom authentication beyond Internet Identity
Modifying existing theme system or walk tracking functionality

Transparent illustration of fitness equipment for decorative background overlay (weight-decoration-right.dim_200x300.png)
Transparent nature element with leaves and mountains for decorative background overlay (nature-decoration-top.dim_400x200.png)
